= Generating .NET class wrappers =

So, you've installed Mono, the DolphinDotNET package, configured/initialized the Mono runtime and now you're wondering "How do I use all that .NET classes?". If want to use some .NET classes all you've to do is generating wrappers for them.

Let suppose that you want to use the DateTime class from the mscorlib assembly
